title: Pleading
context: [ยง425E-1004] Pleading.**** In a derivative action, the complaint shall state with particularity: (1) The date and content of the plaintiff&rsquo;s demand and the general partners&rsquo; response to the demand; or (2) Why demand should be excused as futile. [L 2003, c 210, pt of ยง1]
